name: Don't Get Slammed
description:
A two week game jam project with the theme of "Bang!" Play a game of rock paper scissors against the weird people that live in your neighborhood and see who reigns supreme!

Main Code and Menu Code: Chris Miller
Secondary Code, Animation, Music: Remy Ripple
Level Design and Art: Lindsey Kusterman
Level Design and Art: Darin Thammavongsa
Level Design and Art: Rory Hackney
